member.description: To make the best out of your career, you deserve an experience that answers to YOUR needs and interests. Our free membership gives you exactly that: free, unlimited access to all our content and personalized content and job recommendations based on your interests. Plus, we might have thrown one or two surprises into the mix...  All you need is 2 minutes to create your account!
member.link: Already a member? Amazing! Check out your custom experience

description.1: Get free access to +5000 articles, follow authors, and save for later your favorite content
description.2: Discover our new personalized homepage that picks the best from our content, just for you
description.3: Get a one-month free-pass to Welcome Originals, our streaming App

member.title: Make your own way. Become a member today.

why.description: While we all have to work, we all work differently and for different reasons. We believe that your next professional opportunity, whether it's in a new company or one that results from growing at your current job throughout the years, should be based on your own personal needs.{br}{br}That’s why we’re changing things up and creating something entirely different: a new personalized experience at work that starts in our website. Becoming a member will allow you to choose the content and opportunities you prefer to get more of the content and opportunities you need and want, so you can really thrive at work.{br}{br}Our content is and will always be free. Because we believe that when we prioritize a human approach to work, everyone, no matter what they’re looking for, gets so much more in return.
why.title: Why do we ask you to become a member?

jobs.title: Explore job opportunities

modal.title: About synonyms
modal.list: We’ve expanded your search using the following synonyms:

why.title: Why are we using synonyms?
why.text: We use synonyms to help you find a wider range of job opportunities that match your search. This is particularly useful as job titles may differ from one company to another. We’re just increasing your chances of finding the job that’s the right fit for you!

block1.title: You can add special characters to refine your search:
block1.quote1: Quotes (“ ”) to find an exact match.
block1.quote2: The minus sign (-) to exclude a term.

examples.title: Examples:
examples.quote1: “Graphic Designer” finds jobs with that exact expression.
examples.quote2: Graphic Designer -Sketch finds jobs containing “Graphic Designer”, but not “Sketch”.

block2.text: Your keywords will be searched for in the following fields: Job title, Occupation, Company name, Preferred experience.

cta.subtitle: Think of work differently
cta.text: Want to discover our community of experts?
cta.title: The Lab

header.copy: The workplace is continuously mutating and requires a healthy debate where we can confront different opinions, share new ideas and build a common understanding. We have partnered with the best experts to create a community where each member has an engaged vision on work and constantly questions the place of this opinion in society.{br}Our experts opinions might differ, but we all share a common conviction. The conviction that we can build a new, more human, more inclusive, more fulfilling experience at work with those who want to create, transform, invent, change, explore, provoke question... the modern work experience.{br}This is The Lab!
header.title: The Lab

block.content: Find what you need to thrive in your career
